Title: Kimetsu no Yaiba: Mugen Ressha-hen
Description: ['TV version of ', Kimetsu no Yaiba Movie: Mugen Ressha-hen, ' including an entirely new first episode. The first episode depicts Rengoku as he embarks on his journey to the Mugen Train. The remaining episodes will add about 70 new animation cuts and new background music, as well as a new trailer.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' (Source: ANN)']
